description_html:
Architects turn to AF |New York when a difficult assignment requires professionals to collaborate and execute their design needs. Our area of expertise has allowed this project with Herzog & du Meuron designed for the Ian Schrager Group come to life.

These custom washbasins where created with HDM's designs in mind. The washbasins were created in custom shapes to fit each space in colors that are one of a kind to the hotel. The execution of the details in these designs is combined with the quality and ability to make this work an added value of AF | New York's design.
